item.description: Join us for dinner and dancing! Dinners range from $14 and up. Check out the menu on the website. We will have dinner at 8 pm and then the D.J. starts playing music for dancing at 9:30 pm. Join us for dinner, dancing, or both. Just make sure to leave a comment as to what you are planning. A few of us went dancing at Maxwell's after another meetup and we had a great time!
item.name: Dinner and Dancing at Maxwell Silverman's Toolhouse Restaurant
